case.name: Vatera Pty Limited v Meribal Interiors NSW Pty Limited (Under Deed of Company Arrangement); in the Matter of Meribal Interiors NSW Pty Limited (Under Deed of Company Arrangement) [2008] FCA 468 (8 April 2008)

citphrases.citphrase: cross-claim seeking declaration of validity of deed
false or misleading information contained in administrator's report to meeting of creditors
deficiency in notice of meeting to creditors
terms of deed in unsatisfactory form
whether any proper reason for not making order for termination of deed and winding up of company
